//: ==     GitHub MCP Server Configuration - CogniForge Professional Edition        ==
This configuration enables GitHub Model Context Protocol integration
providing AI assistants with direct access to GitHub repositories,
issues, pull requests, and more through a standardized protocol.
Features:
✅ Direct GitHub API access through MCP protocol
✅ Secure token-based authentication
✅ Docker containerized for consistency
✅ Compatible with VSCode, Cursor, and other MCP-enabled IDEs
✅ Multi-platform support (Gitpod, Codespaces, Local)
Setup Instructions:
1. Get your GitHub Personal Access Token from:
https://github.com/settings/tokens
2. Add GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN to your .env file
3. For VSCode/Cursor: This file will be auto-detected
4. For manual setup: Use the configuration below

github.//: GitHub MCP Server - Provides GitHub API access to AI assistants

metadata.description: GitHub MCP Server - Professional GitHub integration for AI assistants
